list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: clean or dry (something) by rubbing its surface with a cloth, a piece of paper, or one's hand.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Paul wiped his face with a handkerchief
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Paul lau mặt bằng khăn tay

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: things have happened to wipe the smile off Kate's face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mọi thứ đã xảy ra để lau nụ cười trên khuôn mặt của Kate

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: erase data from (a computer system or electronic or magnetic storage device).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I discovered all of my hard drives had been wiped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi phát hiện ra tất cả các ổ cứng của tôi đã bị xóa sổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a disposable cloth treated with a cleansing agent, for wiping things clean.
a cinematographic effect in which an existing picture seems to be wiped out by a new one as the boundary between them moves across the screen.
